title: Tile, 1947
medium: High fire earthenware, polychrome underglaze decoration
description:
White ground. Diagonally placed on tile, its head toward lower left corner, a greatly magnified form of Mus Domestica (the house fly), in green. Inscribed underglaze green. Lower right corner: "Janeway"
Tile backed with green felt.

tombstone.epitaph: Tile, 1947.High fire earthenware, polychrome underglaze decoration. 1947-68-1.
